metadata.title: CVE-2017-10800 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: When GraphicsMagick 1.3.25 processes a MATLAB image in coders/mat.c, it canlead to a denial of service (OOM) in ReadMATImage() if the size specifiedfor a MAT Object is larger than the actual amount of data.

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
